post:
We're a small-time host who doesn't advertise here as often (our main source of income is management for local businesses) but since Black Friday's coming up soon, enjoy our Black Friday Shared Hosting offers!

These offers are valid until November 28, 2020 or until stocks last.

**cPanel - USA BF2020**

* 5 GB SSD-based Storage
* Unlimited Bandwidth
* Unlimited MySQL Databases
* 3 Addon Domains
* Unlimited Subdomains
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* cPanel + LiteSpeed + Softaculous
* Hosted in Dallas, Texas
* Limited Stock
* $4.25/YEAR
 
Order now: https://accounts.teradelta.com/order/config/index/black-friday-2020/?group_id=10&pricing_id=129
